meanings.definition: Clumsy or uncoordinated in movement or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The bear's lubberly attempt to catch the fish was quite amusing.
meanings.sent2: She tripped over her own feet in a lubberly manner.
meanings.sent3: The lubberly penguin waddled awkwardly across the ice.
meanings.sent4: His lubberly dance moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The lubberly robot bumped into walls as it tried to navigate the room.

meanings.sent1: The new recruit was a lubberly on the ship, always dropping things.
meanings.sent2: The lubberly struggled to keep up with the rest of the team.
meanings.sent3: The lubberly at the party spilled their drink on the host.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a lubberly in the ballet class full of graceful dancers.
meanings.sent5: The lubberly in the race finished last, but with a smile on their face.
